# GET /v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/offerCodes | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/offerCodes ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-offerCodes)

-  GET /v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/offerCodes 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/offerCodes

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-offerCodes#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/offerCodes
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-offerCodes#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-offerCodes#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-offerCodes#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[SubscriptionOfferCodesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscriptionoffercodeslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-offerCodes#see-also)

### [Endpoints](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-offerCodes#Endpoints)

[`Create an Auto-Renewable Subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-subscriptions)Create an auto-renewable subscription for your app.[`Read Subscription Subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-subscriptions-_id_)Update a specific auto-renewable subscription.[`Delete a Subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-subscriptions-_id_)Delete a specific auto-renewable subscription that you configured for an app.[`List All Localizations for an Auto-Renewable Subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-subscriptionlocalizations)Get a list of the subscription localizations for a specific auto-renewable subscription.[`GET /v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/subscriptionLocalizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-subscriptionlocalizations)[`List All Introductory Offers for a Subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-introductoryoffers)Get a list of introductory offers for a specific auto-renewable subscription.[`List All Introductory Offer Resource IDs for an Auto-Renewable Subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-introductoryoffers)Get a list of resource IDs representing introductory offers for an auto-renewable subscription.[`Delete an Introductory Offer from a Subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-introductoryoffers)Delete a specific introductory offer for an auto-renewable subscription.[`Read Promoted Purchase Information for a Subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-promotedpurchase)Get details about the promoted purchase of an auto-renewable subscription.[`GET /v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/promotedPurchase`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-promotedpurchase)[`List All Offer Codes for a Subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-offercodes)Get a list of subscription offer codes for a specific auto-renewable subscription.[`List All Promotional Offer Resource IDs for an Auto-Renewable Subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-promotionaloffers)Get a list of promotional offers for a specific auto-renewable subscription.[`GET /v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/promotionalOffers`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-promotionaloffers)[`List All Price Points for a Subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-pricepoints)Get a list of price points for an auto-renewable subscription by territory.
